short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immediatelly start taking note in your new chrome tab. Your notes will be stored in chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can see your notes directly by opening a new tab. You dont have to remember where did you put your notes. Dobule click to anywhere to start taking note immediatelly.
